title: Next anthro champion should be a lagomorph/leporid/rabbit girl
body:
Honestly i think riot needs to give us the bunny girl we so desire.
I think this is a good idea as they are lovable creatures.

my idea was a support rabbit girl.
able to travel a network of holes she can use as traps.
the holes are invisible and needs oracles to be seen.

Well she is supposed to be a deep support.
meaning your not a brute killer.

-skills

"Passive" Her skills would be her map awareness. "passive"
She herself has increased map awareness.

"Q" ability to hop into and out of fights and her ability to bait players into them with her Dash.
"W"She would be able to enchant wards. giving bonus vision.
"E" Lay traps. "short channel"

"R" her ult that would lock enemies in place if they fall into a trap. it acts like a short stun.

She does have a teemo jest because she is yandere crazy of teemo.



essentially she is a bait that leads players into traps and is able to travel to holes dug and hold players for a extra amount of time. 
after this she becomes very vulnerable.

-high mobility being a key factor.

replies.body:
Perm stealth tunnels would be too OP, how about as her passive, health pots are replaced by carrots which give double the recovery and movement speed bonus.

Q in a small hop that allows jumping over walls possible, that also shoots a small cone behind of dirt that does small damage and slows.
W allows her to dig a small hole that when stepped over does small AP damage, and snares, trap is invis but has a 16 sec cooldown. also only 3 trap count.
E  similar to quinn's E, except not only do you leap back, you also push the enemy back. a combo of quinn's leap and alistar headbutt.
R "That's MY Carrot!". a carrot pops up from the ground and after a short delay, she rushes towards it becoming "Unstoppable" and knocking aside enemies in the path. ends when she either reaches the carrot or collides with non-player made terrain.
No give us bunny boy character.

👍

Already looking forward to the fanart.
how about no, im tired of animal ear anime girls. so no. please god no.

I think this is an interesting idea. It would be something along the lines of RekSai however I would allow for the holes to be spread more apart and give them a stun if someone was to walk over them. Regarding lore this could simply be a new species from another island as there is islands on the map that have seemingly no one inhabiting them. This is a good idea for a new champion and I think you could expand it more and really plan out the kit!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

>
> https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zq_w1B9yjzw/hqdefault.jpg

Not good enough.
that a bunny costume.
not a bunny.

you have no idea how much i need that skin.
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}

I don't think there's any Vastaya tribes that are bunnies, nor do I think an Ascended or Demi-God would take on the form of a bunny.
Our best bet would be something like a bunny Yordle.

> [{quoted}](name=IronyAndSublime,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=YE1yNa4H,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-09-22T23:53:30.431+0000)
>
> Furry.

Are you trying to insult me?
because i take that as a compliment regardless.
